text: Jessie James Decker welcomed her third child in March. And on Monday the 30 - year - old country singer reminded her fans yet again that she has lost all the baby weight as she was seen walking in Miami Beach in her workout clothes. The South Beach Diet ambassador pushed a stroller that had her newborn son Forest inside. On the move : Jessie James Decker welcomed her third child in March. And on Monday the 30 - year - old country singer reminded her fans yet again that she has lost all the baby weight as she was seen walking in Miami Beach Jessie and her husband, Eric Decker, became parents of three just a few months ago with the birth of Forest, who was born on March 31. The couple married in June 2013, and just a few months following their nuptials announced they were expecting Vivian
